name: Focus Mobile
overview: Founded in 2009, Focus Mobile provides global roaming services covering 186 destinations. Our customer base ranges from major transnational companies to private international travelers. The worldwide coverage is assured by the extensive portfolio of direct agreements with Tier1 mobile operators around the world, including Vodafone, T-Mobile and AT&T. In addition to its global online e-store, Focus Mobile is represented by local wholesale distributors and retail points of sales in 10 countries. With close connections in the travel industry and well-established online brand, Focus Mobile has gained a leading market position with its broad range of services for business and leisure travelers.
